fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give somebody a sour patch kid at night. The first time someone receives a sour patch kid, they will be roleblocked from the sour taste. The second time that person gets a sour patch kid, the sweet taste will give them powerful defense. The third time that person gets a sour patch kid, they will be gone (via Unstoppable attack)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock immunity.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Town.
